Address.label: Address
Address.value: 833 WEST SOUTH BOULDER ROAD, LOUISVILLE, Colorado, 80027-2452, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Gaia Inc is a video streaming service and community that provides curated conscious media in three primary channels-Seeking Truth, Transformation and Yoga-to its subscribers in 185 countries with approximately 8,000 titles. Over 90% of its library is exclusive to Gaia, and approximately 80% of the views are generated by content produced or owned by Gaia.
